comment:
Nose: woody with slight brine notes. Some butteriness and pepper. 

Palate: strong brine, with Peat. Complex flavours with the oakiness, butteriness and brine. Then gives way to a peppery finish.
Very expressive whisky from Yoichi. Floral and fruity with rich finish.
Tried in Nikka Distiller, Youichi in 2018 June.
